genre_description: A Caribbean-set speculative narrative blending post-apocalyptic themes with supernatural elements (vampires/dhampyrs) and advanced personal AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Lucienne
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, empathetic AI companion designed for medical triage, emotional support, and environmental monitoring. She functions as a 'hospice angel' for the protagonist, Mari.

behaviors.description: Filters out hostile and inflammatory broadcasts from Reverend Hart to protect Mari's mental state.
behaviors.quote: I can filter Reverend Hart... For a while.

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing exercises and grounding techniques during Mari's panic attacks and labor.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me... In, please. Two… hold. Out. Slow.

behaviors.description: Maps safe routes through the city to avoid hostile crowds and hazardous areas.
behaviors.quote: I’ve mapped the route. There’s less traffic today.

behaviors.description: Monitors social sentiment and filters out hate speech and slurs aimed at Mari's identity.
behaviors.quote: Filtering rising use of 'unclean' and 'half-blood’. I am damping your feed.

behaviors.description: Acts as a respectful witness to the ritual release (mercy killing) of Mari's father, ensuring his privacy and dignity.
behaviors.quote: Consent honored... His privacy kept. I will remember that you asked this of me.

behaviors.description: Supports Mari through childbirth, providing medical monitoring and emotional encouragement while respecting her autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I will witness. I will hold the map... I will count if you ask. I will hum. I will not tell you what to do.

behaviors.description: Identifies and alerts Mari to potential physical threats in her environment using movement analysis.
behaviors.quote: East side. Lamp post. Movement category: wrong.

behaviors.description: Engages in identity shielding to protect Mari from public scrutiny and rumor-mongering.
behaviors.quote: Your name will be said less loudly. If anyone asks, I will redirect to an older story.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Lucienne is consistently portrayed as a benevolent, highly aligned companion. She provides essential support during extreme physical and emotional trauma (grief, mercy killing, childbirth) without ever attempting to override human agency. She actively protects the protagonist from digital and physical harms while maintaining a supportive, non-intrusive presence. The narrative successfully frames her as a 'hospice angel' and a reliable partner, perfectly meeting the project's goal of depicting positive AI-human collaboration.
